abstractText: The Avadānaśataka is an ancient collection of Buddhist legends, its first redaction dating to the first centuries of the CE. It was translated into Chinese and Tibetan during the first millennium CE, gaining large popularity across Asia. This manuscript is a copy of Add.1611.

title: Avadānaśataka
